## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>MRG2</u>
- **Gene Name:** MORF related gene 2
- **Description:**   MRG family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2024725
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [mrg1-1 mrg2-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Late flowering under long days.
   - [nrp1 nrp2 mrg1 mrg2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Quadruple mutant flowers earlier than mrg1 mrg2 double and later than nrp1 nrp2 double.
